thread.title: Google reveals new logo with doodle
thread.title_full: Google reveals new logo with doodle

title: Google reveals new logo with doodle
text:
Google reveals new logo with doodle 
Technology Industry News.Net (ANI) : Wednesday 2nd September, 2015 
Google has dedicated its latest doodle to its new logo. 
It starts with a hand wiping out Google's old logo and re-writing the company's name with multi-colour crayons that turns into dots followed by a multi-colour G. 
The doodle ends with the new logo wherein a hand appears and tilts the 'E' of Google. (ANI) More Technology Industry News
